coloredTexts.text: Do you imagine a world where you have to break leaves to obtain Apples? That would be totally crazy.
The Iron Apples are not so good than the Golden Apples, but hey, they're cheaper.
I don't know a person who hasn't jumped over the crops. Incredible.
I hate those cats, always chasing the chickens.
The cake is not a lie, is really delicious. But too soft for my taste.
Those golems make a better job than a scarecrow.
